website_summaries.verdict: One of the best modern style towel bars available. Easily adds a degree of elegance to any future-forward bathroom design.
pros: A strong self-adhesive backing makes installation easy, since no tools are required
Great moisture resistance for a tight and secure fit
cons: Modern style won't fit well with more traditional and vintage designs

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and durable
customer_reviews.text: Despite some reviews I had faith and bought this adhesive rack for inside my shower. It’s been a month and the rack has not budged. I thought the humidity from the shower would make it drip but it hasn’t. I use it to hang washcloth. It could fit two folded washcloths. When Installing make sure you know which anchor is left an right. I accidentally switched it and had to take it off. The adhesive cooperated. Also I was surprised the that bar in the middle moves intentionally. Like if you grab something off of it quickly the bar turns. Overall doesn’t bother me and nothing falls off
customer_reviews.author: chenny

customer_reviews.title: What a great little towel bar!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little towel bar! I was not expecting such good quality for the price. I recommend that you stick one of the holders on the wall first... and then mark a level line for the other. That way you will have both hands to carefully place the other bracket+bar exactly where you want it. Because once those babies are stuck, they ain't coming off!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This towel bar is the perfect size I needed. I'm not using it to hang towels, but rather to hang the bath mat. I didn't want to stick the permanent adhesive to my tile, so I soaked the ends in Goo Gone and then used acetone to remove the adhesive. I hung it on my tile with the super duty Command Picture Hanging Strips. Perfect! It does its job very nicely and I can still remove it whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Island Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Sticks well to painted drywall in the kitchen. Have had a small towel to dry hands hanging on it for a few months now with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: CRazz

customer_reviews.title: Great no-drill towel bar for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my tile walls. Comes with two adhesive stickers, but I used it with Command strips. Perfect size for small bathrooms, it will hold one medium size towel flatly on the rod. A regular full-size towel is a little crowded. The nickel finish is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: leed

customer_reviews.title: I cleaned the ruffed the surface with fine sandpaper and cleaned with alcohol
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these. Two the first time and one the second. One of the first purchase would not stay stuck so I ordered another. In the few days it took to get it the other of the first order departed the wood inside door under the sink. I cleaned the ruffed the surface with fine sandpaper and cleaned with alcohol. If these will not stick to wood I doubt they will stick to much of anything. Because my wife loved the look, I drilled two holes in the long end and screw them to the door with stainless pan head screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed/wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my kitchen dish towels. Matches my stainless appliances and so much more attractive than my old wooden one. I looked at a lot of towel bars at local stores but they were all too bulky and stuck out too far on the side of my island cabinet. Though it is less bulky, it is still very sturdy and appears to be well made. Super easy to install (though I did end up cutting down the towel bar itself as I needed one in between the 15 and 21" size). I also used the 3M Command tape as suggested by other reviewers (thanks, guys!), however, I can't see ever wanting to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the camper
customer_reviews.text: added these to our RV. Great addition to the camper. For a family of 5 you need as much hanging capabilities as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Earley

customer_reviews.title: Forget the "stick-on"...you'll need to screw it on!
customer_reviews.text: Forget the "stick on"...USELESS. I had to drill two holes on each bracket and mount it with screws. Other that THAT, its OK.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye wobbly towel bar, hello stability!
customer_reviews.text: Last summer I bought toilet paper holders by the same manufacturer and they work so well I decided to try the towel bar. Took down the old one that was anchored to the wall, filled in the holes, painted the wall and put up the new one. Very stable and looks terrific. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela B Penticuff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I hung these towell bars on the inside of kitchen and bathroom cabinet doors, where the doors are not very thick and that makes it difficult to install screws. These bars are easy to install and work well. The adhesive is very strong and sticks well so make sure when you in install it that it is straight and in the right place the first time, as it is very difficult to remove and re-install. I hope the adhesiveness lasts, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had this on for a month now and I keep a bath sized towel on it after a shower. It holds with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Alternative glue solution
customer_reviews.text: We afixed this towel bar to our glass shower enclosure (which is smooth and clear). The tape provided with the towel bar held one towel for a couple of weeks, them fell off. We then used extra strong indoor-outdoor double sided tape that we purchased at a hardware store. That lasted two days after a curing period. Finally, my husband used silicone sealant/adhesive purchased from the local hardware store, and it has been staying nicely for several months. If applying this to glass, use silicone, not the tape that comes with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorlyn Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold! Good bar!
customer_reviews.text: Great towel rack! We stuck it to the wall and it seems to be working perfectly we’ve had it there for at least a month and it doesn’t appear to be going anywhere! Definitely order these again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: MGT33

customer_reviews.title: Best self adhesive towel bar for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice brush stainless steel hand towel holder that did not need to be screwed into my inside under sink cupboard door. Since it was an interior door, screw-type was not an option because it would have shown on the opposite side. Looks very nice, modern, clean lines and easy to install on under sink MDF board cupboard. I wished they would make a double bar model to hang more towels, rubber gloves and kitchen necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and was easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver in my small apartment bathroom. To prevent damage to the walls (and my security deposit!) I attached removable command strips to the 3M sticker that comes on the towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Stick
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these after remodeling my bathroom. I stuck one onto a newly painted wall and one onto a newly tiled wall. They would both fall off within 24 hours unless I kept going in and pressing them onto the wall. Finally returned them after they fell for the 3rd or 4th time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping walls hole free
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, after breaking the drywall and fixing I decided to buy this adhesive mount and it did the trick. It does not flex nor does it feel like it has any give
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smaller size
customer_reviews.text: The towel bar is perfect for small spaces. Super easy to put up. Looks great in my bathroom. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Well-made self adhesive towel bar.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well-made towel bar. The adhesive backing is very strong and eliminated the need to drill holes into my bathroom ceramic tile. Will probably buy a second one. Only wish it came in a larger length.
customer_reviews.author: sirius1nWA

customer_reviews.title: I prepared the area for mounting by cleaning the tiles with fine emery cloth and a green scrubbie
customer_reviews.text: I used this on Ceramic tiles in the shower for an extra towel. I prepared the area for mounting by cleaning the tiles with fine emery cloth and a green scrubbie. before mounting I cleaned the area with alcohol. It adhered very well and shows no signs of loosening.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item is perfect. Perfect size, super awesome adhesion! And very very sturdy!! Love it! Will buy some more!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I have two, one for my bath towel and one for my hand towels. Perfect size, apply to dry surface using adequate pressure several hours before exposure to steam and moisture. One of mine is directly in my shower, and both are attached very strong to my wall. I actually paid my own cash money for these products.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Buccigrossi

customer_reviews.title: Love this. We rent and don’t enjoy putting holes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We rent and don’t enjoy putting holes in walls but yet have a desire to decorate and make our space look nice. This is perfect! It’s held up now for over a month, feels strong and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cymaro

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this to hang my handtowel. So easy to install. Its sturdy and definitely not coming off the wall
customer_reviews.author: vegas grl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It held on to my wall for about two hours then fell down and it was hard for me to put it back on because the adhesive would not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made item.. I've seen these in the stores for more $ and they were made out of a plastic, this is a strong metal. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Second one I've ordered. Once it's on, it's not coming off.
customer_reviews.author: cindy l.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy small towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Solid metal bar and brackets. Simple peel and stick foam mounting square installation. Don't know if the tape would come off cleanly on a wall. I mounted on the side of a floating trough sink.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Rial

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition.
customer_reviews.text: I peeled away some (but not all) of the backing and applied Loctite adhesive to it. Put it on wall in shower area and it has stayed there with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: roger r.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this for inside our shower to hang a towel or wash cloth under a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of the product and the speed in which it arrived. It was extremely easy to install and the material is of excellent quality. I would recommend this to anyone who does not wish to drill holes into a wall or door for hanging towels. It is also very well priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and very useful in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Fred Alan TAylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, well made, but mine fell after a few months. Don't understand why it would fall after that long. Ordering some VHB tape to re-install
customer_reviews.author: EastFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Here's a suggestion for the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the negative reviews for this product relate to the quality of the adhesive. So I, like other reviewers, removed the supplied adhesive backing (not an easy task!) and replaced it with 3M large water-resistant Command strips. The bar is now holding fine on the back of the bathroom door. The manufacturer should replace the ineffective supplied adhesive pads with the Command strips to improve the product quality and get better reviews. Other than that, the bar looks good. The design is modern and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: JenStein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Stylish. Well made. Easy to install. Seem very securely attached to a smooth, glass shower enclosure. I suspect the negative comments regarding these falling off are a result of poor surface preparation. I cleaned the surface thoroughly with isopropyl alcohol. There were no mounting instructions included, which may account for mounting difficulties experienced by others.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: loved it, so I bought three more so use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my bathroom, loved it, so I bought three more so use as scarf storage and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, reasonably priced product that delivers all its promises
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Hi-quality. A 2-year-old could install it and then chin himself on it -- that's how firmly it sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Stickers are not good enough- find something with screws!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. I saw some some reviews that said the stick on design was bad. Other reviewers said it worked fine. I should have gone with my gut. Stay away! Pulled down after a month of light use. Do yourself a favor and get something that mounts the right way. Stickers and towel racks are just not a viable solution. Trust your gut. Read the bad reviews. Pick something else. I don't know how to say it any more plainly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install towel rack-no tools needed
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful towel rack. Easy to install and the glue is very substantial to hold the rack in place. I am so very pleased with this product and hopefully it will remain in place in the years to come. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: nicely made....but needs screw holes...tape always fails....always!
customer_reviews.text: Well made.... but forget using the tape only I drilled holes in it and screwed it to the walll
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Holds strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I would not have to drill the tile in our bathroom to have a towel near the shower. Went on super easy and has worked for months on a textured tile. Would defiantly buy this again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: G. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Stays put, holds wet towel
customer_reviews.text: Wish there were a way to remove without damaging the wall
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: good towel bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is as advertised. I bought one for one of my bathrooms. Easy to install. Still hanging strong. I needed a new bar for my second bathroom. Ordered the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Schild

customer_reviews.title: Holding it great - so far
customer_reviews.text: Holding it great - so far! Time will tell if it stays up or ends up falling like others have experienced...
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary Towel Bar, but did not Stick to Wall
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, contemporary and modern towel bar. Not having to damage the wall of my apartment is a great plus - but the adhesives did not stick. I have other self-adhesive hooks and things with no issue. I wish the adhesives worked! PROS: Contemporary look Great size bar CONS: Did not stick to wall
customer_reviews.author: Malika K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Assemble and mounting we're easy and it functions well inside my shower as a wash cloth bar.
customer_reviews.author: HB Terry

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great, but we aware
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, but we aware, it might fall off depending on the surface. I had to reattach mine with glue, but it might be my fault (forgot to clean the wall before installing).
customer_reviews.author: V Perez-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is more like a washcloth holder than a towel holder
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot smaller than I expected it to be (shame on me)... This is more like a washcloth holder than a towel holder.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just as described. Fit my space and attached securely. don't hesitate on this.
customer_reviews.author: Meringue

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wish could be easily removed
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully but wish it had the ability to be easily removed like a command strip.
customer_reviews.author: Pietro

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for guest bath. Used as directed and no problem with it staying up for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive removes plaster🙁
customer_reviews.text: I thought the 3 m adhesive was a great idea as my condo has metal studs. However, the weight of two dry towels pulled my plastered dry wall off of the wall. Now need to plaster and repaint🙁
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, so far It stuck to the tile very well. I bought other products that held up for awhile and keep falling off. This one is really stuck just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson718

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. The size of the back that sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size. The size of the back that sticks to the wall was large enough to give the rod plenty of adhesion to the tile wall. Should have done this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: David Kempfe

customer_reviews.title: The towel bar fell a few hours after putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: The towel bar fell a few hours after putting it up. No matter what I did it would not stick to the tile
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Different than other 3M products
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the adhesive on these did not work for me. I stuck it to the same wall that other 3M hooks were on, but this one didn't stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Guy

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive failed after 3 weeks. Trying Command adhesive now ...
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive failed after 3 weeks. Trying Command adhesive now. The bar and brackets are decent and the right size I needed.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Stick Towel Bar
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the towel bar. The adhesive seems strong, and since I live in an apt with tile that goes all the way to the ceiling, drilling into the tile wasn't an option. I was happy to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Wallach

customer_reviews.title: Towel bar
customer_reviews.text: It will not stick to surface and I see no other way to put it up.maybe super glue might work,I haven`t tried that,better buy one that has screws,
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shively

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight and perfect. So easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Looooove this!!! I will get all my bathroom kitchen products from here. Fits tight and perfect. So easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Happy$$AmazonLover😄

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and is sticking to my bathroom shower wall ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and is sticking to my bathroom shower wall after lots of heat and humidity. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie M Fan

customer_reviews.title: This looks great. It looks like something you would spend twice ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great. It looks like something you would spend twice the money on and fits exactly where i wanted it to go
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These towel racks work great. I actually have several of them in my house where I don’t want to drill holes.
customer_reviews.author: Gay C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution for a towel bar in my tile shower so I can hang the bath mat. Very easy to install and looks attractive.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Solidly constructed. Time will tell as to how well the adhesive lasts.
customer_reviews.author: forager

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stick!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks very nice but no matter where I've tried to install it, it falls down within a couple of days! I followed the manufacturer instructions to a "T" but it failed to stick. I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! Sticks to right to the tile and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice hold, nice look. Perfect size for our guest bathroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: bevy104

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the towel bar and how sleek ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one who likes writiting reviews, but I feel I must. I love the look of the towel bar and how sleek and modern it is; however, it is not worth it! the adhesive did not stick to my wall and peeled the paint off. Unless you are going to crazy glue it or hot glue it onto the wall I suggest passing this item by.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item works well and suits the purpose it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel bar and the ends are heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly simple to install. No drilling, no screws, fastened quickly and solidly to our painted bathroom wall. Well worth the price. Thanks to KES.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of them. It worked as advertised and we love it! It is a great product because I didn't have to drill more holes in my bathroom. Thank you! The best way to install it is to place one bracket at a time if you want to ensure a straight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stick to Anything, I hung it and 5 mins later it was on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mccline

customer_reviews.title: Bad adhesive quality
customer_reviews.text: The Rod could not hold a wet towel. Bad adhesive quality
customer_reviews.author: Tav

customer_reviews.title: ... side of the adhesive brackets is crooked and looks terrible on the wall
customer_reviews.text: One side of the adhesive brackets is crooked and looks terrible on the wall. KES said they would send a replacement. To date we have not received the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for glass shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to attach to a glass shower that had no holes in the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my plaster walls which are very hard to drill into! Great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed for the small bathroom. Holds a hand towel well, no problems. Easy to apply, nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Musician-Mom

customer_reviews.title: This product would not stick to my wall. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This product would not stick to my wall. The bar must be too heavy for it. I also bought the towel hook and the toilet paper holder and they both stuck. It was the same wall as the towel holder.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved the items although we had to screw them on since adhesive didn't hold. Sad when we were gone a several months and upon return they were rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Marcine Fennel

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I do have a question about installation & no instructions were included with the towel bar. This item will be installed on a tiled bathroom wall; so (1) how do I prep the tile so that the 3M adhesive will attach properly, and (2) what is the correct position for the brackets: does the longer space go at the top or the bottom?
customer_reviews.author: Lora M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, heavy feel, not cheap. Looks good, great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: it looks stylish and was easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: it looks stylish and was easy to put up. though the sticky pads on the back lost its strength after a couple days and all three pieces fell down. I needed to reinforce them with smaller pads on top of the original ones, which held longer, though they eventually lost their strength after a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the overall look and very easy to put up.. will buy again if needed more.
customer_reviews.author: ncwirka

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Used 2 to hang face towels in our bathroom, and another to hang kitchen towels in our kitchen. Very clean, modern look and simple to install. Adhesive strips hold extremely well to wood cabinets. Product arrived well-packed. No instructions included, but it's very basic peel and stick. Very happy customer. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive will not hold and the towel bar itself ...
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive will not hold and the towel bar itself was bent, and so the brackets were no straight, causing the bar to continual fall off the cleaned surface, I eventually just threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Thurber

customer_reviews.title: It looks quite nice I like the design tho I got a deficiency
customer_reviews.text: It looks quite nice I like the design tho I got a deficiency, the self adhesive part is used before and not sticky anymore... Returned it to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay stuck to my tile backsplash
customer_reviews.text: I tried every which way to get this bar to stick to my tile backsplash in my kitchen. It just doesn't hold at all. For reference though, I am hanging 10 kitchen utensils (silicon spatulas, bamboo spoons, etc...). So maybe this is just too heavy and one towel would be fine. I'm not sure though. The 3M tape it came with just didn't seem strong enough. After that didn't work, I tried different 3M tape and that also did not work. I really like the look of the bar though. It was exactly what I was looking for it only it would stay up.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to attach to my bathroom sink for a hand towel. Fell off one day after installation :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a medium sized towel
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. Since its self sticking, you can basically place this anywhere and not worry having to drill holes in your walls. Perfect for a medium sized towel.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love this towel rack 3 pieces to attach together
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel rack 3 pieces to attach together. Love that there will be no damage to the wall. I'm glad I was able to "install" it myself!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA P

customer_reviews.title: Stick on doesn't stick for more than a day. ...
customer_reviews.text: Stick on doesn't stick for more than a day. Fell off and peeled the paint off with it. Going back to screws!
customer_reviews.author: joeb1415

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Product only hung for about 2 hours before it came crashing down. Was very disappointed in the product considering the material was a solid metal composite. Wish the sticky part was stronger. And there is no option for return :/
customer_reviews.author: Lesya Zubov

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and really like the fact that we didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this towel bar for use in our trailer trailer. Easy installation and really like the fact that we didn't have to screw anything into the walls. The adhesive seems to be holding up well, no complaints. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carla A. Long

customer_reviews.title: I would have rated it a 5 for the holding ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated it a 5 for the holding power but the space between the bar and wall is small and hard to hang a thicker towel on
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this thing to stick to the wall. I even tried Super Glue and it wouldn't stay. I threw it out and gave up on the idea of having a rod in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Kastle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed however the adhesive is poor fell off the wall right away after it fell ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed however the adhesive is poor fell off the wall right away after it fell off 3 times I pruchesed heavy duty adhesive. I also pruchesed 22 inch towel bar same problem
customer_reviews.author: jan kelly

customer_reviews.title: Needs Epoxy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect towel rack for what I need but the adhesive doesn't stick. I used epoxy instead and it is now sticking securely.
